I am a professor at the College of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. I serve as the Co-Director of the Autonomous Learning Laboratory (ALL),  one of the oldest and most influential machine learning laboratories in the US, with close to 40 graduated PhD students.
